resources.string: Remember to stay happy at the end fo the day.
Do Not Keep Things To Yourself
Failures makes us learn from our mistakes and become better.
You can have cheat meals occasionally, but not too often.
Go exercise to stay fit and keep yourself in shape.
You are an adult now, take care of yourself.
Sleeps are important, a good sleep will help you start a day with energy.
As a man, you can cry. But not in front of others. After that, move on with your life.
Play your games to relieve stress but do not get addicted.
Always cherish friends who are there for you.
Good friends can help a lot in our life, bad friends will make our life harder.
Your parents raised you into adulthood, the least you can do is show love to them.
Social medias can be fun, but do not get too indulged or you will be mentally affected.
Find yourself a significant other when you have the ability to make him/her happy.
Sometimes you need to read before asking.
Google knows almost everything, ask him.
There are times when we feel demotivated, take a rest and move on.
Music can help you to stay awake, but do not let it distract you.
Overthinking can cause anxiety, depression and other mental problems.
This semester might be overwhelming, but it is also a chance to train yourself physically and mentally.
We are awake at least 16 hours per day, use it wisely.
Do Not Be Too Hard On Yourself
Do your best and accept how far you can go.
Treat others nicely if you want to be treated nicely
Coffee keeps you awake, but do not drink it to the point you cannot sleep without it.
Bathing helps you relax and clear your mind.
Reward yourself whenever you achieve something.
You will never get too old to study something.
Remember your plans and believe that you are destined for success
See more or less information about a daily tip.
